properties.entry: SELECT RESTAURANT_ID, RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_CATEGORY,RESTAURANT_SNS, RESTAURANT_IMG FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RESTAURANT_X = ? AND RESTAURANT_Y = ?

SELECT w.WISHLIST_IDX, r.RESTAURANT_ID, r.RESTAURANT_NAME, r.RESTAURANT_ADDR, r.RESTAURANT_CATEGORY, r.RESTAURANT_SNS, r.RESTAURANT_TEL, r.RESTAURANT_TIME, r.RESTAURANT_IMG, r.RESTAURANT_CONTENTS FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN REST_WISHLIST w ON r.RESTAURANT_ID = w.RESTAURANT_ID WHERE w.MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT RESTAURANT_ID FROM REST_WISHLIST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
